channel.title: Yet another noob mistake... :o

item.title: Yet another noob mistake... :o
item.dc:creator: @Retard_Monkey Retard Monkey
item.description:
@Retard_Monkey wrote:

Slom was right, I had spelt ‘else’ as ‘esle’ on one of the thingymajigs. All fixed now.

Thanks!

Read full topic

item.title: Yet another noob mistake... :o
item.dc:creator: @slomifier slomifier
item.description:
@slomifier wrote:

Maybe you have and “else if” without and “if”? Idk. I’ve got this before, and sometimes its what I said, sometimes its a parenthesis is missing, and sometimes a literal quote is missing. GO to where you last were working and make sure it’s all there.

Read full topic

item.title: Yet another noob mistake... :o
item.dc:creator: @Fabis Fabis
item.description:
@Fabis wrote:

Well im not that good but i suggest u delete or correct the skills, barrows, mining, makemem etc. commands. SOmething wrong with them

item.title: Yet another noob mistake... :o
item.dc:creator: @Retard_Monkey Retard Monkey
item.description:
@Retard_Monkey wrote:

Hey,

As you all know im as thick as dairy-lea cheese.
I’ve made yet ANOTHER mistake. I’ve been trying to change the death message, where you go when you die, added some NPCs, added 2 teleport commands…
Even I don’t know how I could mess that up, but I can, and I have.
Whenever I attempt to compile, I get this:

^ client.java:12032: illegal start of type } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("skills")) { ^ client.java:12032: ';' expected } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("skills")) { ^ client.java:12032: invalid method declaration; return type required } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("skills")) { ^ client.java:12032: illegal start of type } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("skills")) { ^ client.java:12032: ';' expected } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("skills")) { ^ client.java:12041: illegal start of type } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("barrows")) { ^ client.java:12041: ';' expected } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("barrows")) { ^ client.java:12041: illegal start of type } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("barrows")) { ^ client.java:12041: ';' expected } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("barrows")) { ^ client.java:12041: invalid method declaration; return type required } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("barrows")) { ^ client.java:12041: illegal start of type } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("barrows")) { ^ client.java:12041: ';' expected } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("barrows")) { ^ client.java:12050: illegal start of type } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("mining")) { ^ client.java:12050: ';' expected } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("mining")) { ^ client.java:12050: illegal start of type } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("mining")) { ^ client.java:12050: ';' expected } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("mining")) { ^ client.java:12050: invalid method declaration; return type required } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("mining")) { ^ client.java:12050: illegal start of type } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("mining")) { ^ client.java:12050: ';' expected } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("mining")) { ^ client.java:12063: illegal start of type } else if (command.startsWith("makemem")) { { ^ client.java:12063: ';' expected } else if (command.startsWith("makemem")) { { ^ client.java:12063: illegal start of type } else if (command.startsWith("makemem")) { { ^ client.java:12063: ';' expected } else if (command.startsWith("makemem")) { { ^ client.java:12063: invalid method declaration; return type required } else if (command.startsWith("makemem")) { { ^ client.java:12063: illegal start of type } else if (command.startsWith("makemem")) { { ^ client.java:12063: ';' expected } else if (command.startsWith("makemem")) { { ^ client.java:12083: illegal start of type if (command.startsWith("gs")) { ^ client.java:12083: <identifier> expected if (command.startsWith("gs")) { ^ client.java:12083: ';' expected if (command.startsWith("gs")) { ^ client.java:12083: illegal start of type if (command.startsWith("gs")) { ^ client.java:12083: <identifier> expected if (command.startsWith("gs")) { ^ client.java:12083: ';' expected if (command.startsWith("gs")) { ^ client.java:12084: <identifier> expected teleportToX = 2845; ^ client.java:12085: <identifier> expected teleportToY = 4832; ^ client.java:12086: invalid method declaration; return type required sendMessage( ^ client.java:12087: illegal start of type "Welcome godsword mini game, kill the monsters to advance ro unds"); ^ client.java:12088: invalid method declaration; return type required sendMessage( ^ client.java:12089: illegal start of type "The monsters hp starts at 150 then next monster is 250 and so on"); ^ client.java:12090: invalid method declaration; return type required sendMessage("Godsword Mini game :D"); ^ client.java:12090: illegal start of type sendMessage("Godsword Mini game :D"); ^ client.java:12093: class, interface, or enum expected if (command.startsWith("membership")) { ^ client.java:12096: class, interface, or enum expected sendMessage("Player " + member + " has become a Member!"); ^ client.java:12098: class, interface, or enum expected for (int a = 1; a < PlayerHandler.maxPlayers; a++) { ^ client.java:12098: class, interface, or enum expected for (int a = 1; a < PlayerHandler.maxPlayers; a++) { ^ client.java:12098: class, interface, or enum expected for (int a = 1; a < PlayerHandler.maxPlayers; a++) { ^ client.java:12103: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ client.java:12110: class, interface, or enum expected sendMessage("Suggestion Succesfully Sent To God of Pain!"); ^ client.java:12111: class, interface, or enum expected BufferedWriter bw = null; ^ client.java:12112: class, interface, or enum expected String suggestion = command.substring(8); ^ client.java:12114: class, interface, or enum expected try { ^ client.java:12116: class, interface, or enum expected bw.write(playerName + ": " + suggestion); ^ client.java:12117: class, interface, or enum expected bw.newLine(); ^ client.java:12118: class, interface, or enum expected bw.flush(); ^ client.java:12119: class, interface, or enum expected } catch (IOException ioe) { ^ client.java:12121: class, interface, or enum expected } finally { ^ client.java:12125: class, interface, or enum expected } catch (IOException ioe2) { ^ client.java:12127: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ client.java:12134: class, interface, or enum expected addSkillXP(14910000, 1); ^ client.java:12176: class, interface, or enum expected stillgfx(547, absY+1, absX-1); //547 = Exploding bomb with smoke ^ client.java:12177: class, interface, or enum expected stillgfx(547, absY-1, absX+1); ^ client.java:12178: class, interface, or enum expected stillgfx(547, absY+1, absX+1); ^ client.java:12179: class, interface, or enum expected stillgfx(547, absY-1, absX-1); ^ 100 errors Files Compiled Successfully! Anybody with a brain please help the brainless?
~Retard Monkey
